comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content:
I checked Google Streetview, and it looks like none of these buildings are still standing. There's a Walgreen on this corner now.

You know you misspelled "Cincinnati?"

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the spelling of Cincinnati in the source data and reload the description.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
Hi Wystan,
Thanks for the encouragement to update the descriptions. We're going to try repairing the typos directly in Flickr, and have also lined up more help to update the master catalog records for Bain photos at the Library each week with the new dates and subjects.

It'll be September or October, though, before all the changed records roll back into Flickr through the batch reloading. 

Aiming to keep up a whole lot better with all the helpful historical comments!
